item.description: i like typography, fountain pens, sunglasses, computers, calculus, physics (which i am terrible at), linguistics, modern art, angsty poetry, film, and plants. i was born in 1998 and i live near washington dc or boston. my pronouns are she/her, and my mbti is infp, i think. i write code often using vim, which i am fanatic about. i make many different kinds of art in my free time i enjoy both coffee and tea.
art around the web 9999yea.rs, gif art mograph reel webprocess, work in progress techb@flickr, 35mm photography 999flowers@tumblr, still art

projects I C the Light, a distance-estimating ray marcher (image output gallery) mandelbrot.becca.ooo, an interactive Mandelbrot set exploration tool with novel iteration visualization integral.becca.ooo, an interactive integral approximation visualization img glitcher, an in-browser procedural databending app snell’s law simulator population dynamics simulator random #hashtag generator #wrap, a Chrome extension to modify Tumblr’s user interface by adding line-wrapping for post tags. Peaked at ≈35,000 users. twitter bots @goodwordsbot — real-sounding fake words based on latin and greek roots
